biotools.summary: CapsNet-SSP is a multilane capsule network for predicting human saliva-secretory proteins. Compared with disease biomarkers in blood and urine, biomarkers in saliva have distinct advantages, as they can be examined with convenient clinical tests and through noninvasive sample collection.

bioschemas.name: CapsNet-SSP

Compared with disease biomarkers in blood and urine, biomarkers in saliva have distinct advantages, as they can be examined with convenient clinical tests and through noninvasive sample collection.
